${ModID}:Aftermath.NAME: Aftermath
${ModID}:Aftermath.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Exhausted, apply !M! ${ModID}:Venom to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Anchor.NAME: Anchor
${ModID}:Anchor.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Block is not removed at the start of your next turn. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:BlackMist.NAME: Black Mist
${ModID}:BlackMist.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${ModID}:Venom and !${ModID}:M2! Weak to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Connection.NAME: Connection
${ModID}:Connection.DESCRIPTION: Lose all [${ModID}:CenturionIcon] and [${ModID}:MysticIcon] . NL Gain that much [E]. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Connection.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose all [${ModID}:CenturionIcon] and [${ModID}:MysticIcon] . NL Gain that much [E].

${ModID}:Crush.NAME: Crush
${ModID}:Crush.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you do not have an ${ModID}:Infusion, deal !D! damage again.

${ModID}:FieldTactics.NAME: Field Tactics
${ModID}:FieldTactics.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Call a ${ModID}:Centurion card and a ${ModID}:Mystic card. NL Next turn, draw !M! additional card{@@}{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:FollowMe.NAME: Follow Me
${ModID}:FollowMe.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you ${ModID}:Call a card, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:Hasten.NAME: Hasten
${ModID}:Hasten.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Call !M! ${ModID}:Centurion card{@@}{!M!|>1=s}. NL {!M!|1=It costs|@=They cost} 0 this turn.
${ModID}:Hasten.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Call !M! ${ModID}:Centurion card{@@}{!M!|>1=s} and Upgrade {!M!|1=it|@=them}. NL {!M!|1=It costs|@=They cost} 0 this turn.

${ModID}:LesserPolymorph.NAME: Lesser Polymorph
${ModID}:LesserPolymorph.DESCRIPTION: Enemy becomes a Louse. Reverts back in !M! turn{@@}{!M!|>1=s} or when killed. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:MaceCrash.NAME: Mace Crash
${ModID}:MaceCrash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage if you have an ${ModID}:Infusion.

${ModID}:PurestSteel.NAME: Purest Steel
${ModID}:PurestSteel.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Shed all Attack cards in your hand.

${ModID}:QuickThinking.NAME: Quick Thinking
${ModID}:QuickThinking.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you ${ModID}:Survey, you may take !M! additional card{@@}{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:SheerPower.NAME: Sheer Power
${ModID}:SheerPower.DESCRIPTION: Attacks deal !M! additional damage while you do not have an ${ModID}:Infusion.

${ModID}:Slither.NAME: Slither
${ModID}:Slither.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Shed !M! card{@@}{!M!|>1=s} at random.

${ModID}:SnakeBite.NAME: Snake Bite
${ModID}:SnakeBite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply ${ModID}:Venom equal to unblocked damage dealt.

${ModID}:SnakeEyes.NAME: Snake Eyes
${ModID}:SnakeEyes.DESCRIPTION: Set the cost of ALL your cards to 1 for the rest of combat. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:StandStrong.NAME: Stand Strong
${ModID}:StandStrong.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${ModID}:Shed !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:TapTheImmaterial.NAME: Tap the Immaterial
${ModID}:TapTheImmaterial.DESCRIPTION: Add Ethereal to all cards in your hand. NL Whenever you Exhaust a card this turn, gain !M! Temporary_HP.

${ModID}:WideGuard.NAME: Wide Guard
${ModID}:WideGuard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain !B! Block.
